vulnerability.name: USN-4674-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4674-1 fixed a vulnerability in Dovecot. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Innokentii Sennovskiy discovered that Dovecot incorrectly handled MIME  parsing. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Dovecot  to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2020-25275)

statements.status_notes: Dovecot could be made to denial of service if it received a specially crafted MIME. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
